name: Katy Boyles
bio: My name is KB and I'm a full stack software engineer in Portland, OR. I like travelling, dancing, video games, and reading. The first karaoke song I sang was 'It's Oh So Quiet' by Bjork.

name: Nicole Martin
bio: Hi I’m Nicole! I am a full stack software engineer located in Portland, OR. I enjoy working with computers and collaborating on fun and impactful projects that will help the planet, animals, and all humans. Also a huge fan of vegan food, coffee and being outside in the beautiful Pacific Northwest with my dog, Cooper. My favorite karaoke songs to sing are Cherry Bomb by The Runaways and Sunday Morning by No Doubt.

name: Brandon Perard
bio: Hello, my name's Brandon, and I'm a full stack software engineer in Portland, OR. I enjoy applying my curiosity to figuring out how things work, and then using that knowledge to create something awesome for the people & communities I love. I probably don't dance or sing very well, but I commit to the performance. My first karaoke song was Careless Whisper; Tribute, Gin & Juice, and Rebel Yell are my go-to's.

name: Soraya Benson
bio: Oh hi, I’m Soraya, a full-stack engineer in Portland, OR. I adore interactive storytelling, accessible design, and creating things with rad people. My go to karaoke song is ‘The One That I Want’ from Grease ⚡

name: Lori Winston
bio: I'm Lori, a software engineer who loves hiking, cooking, and petting dogs. I have a soft spot for Electric Light Orchestra at karaoke despite Jeff Lynne's angelic voice being far out of my vocal range.
